alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Henderson; Henry; Madison; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 1:53PM CST until December 09 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Crockett County in west Tennessee... Southeastern Weakley County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Henderson County in west Tennessee... Southern Gibson County in west Tennessee... Carroll County in west Tennessee... Northern Madison County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 245 PM CST. * At 152 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Humboldt, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, McKenzie, Trenton, Huntingdon, Fairview, Alamo, Bells, Three Way, Atwood, Adair, Carroll, Medina, Trezevant, Gadsden, Gibson, Clarksburg, McLemoresville, and Hickory Flat. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Henderson; Henry; Madison; Weakley
